@graph.reasoning: The case is relevant to the registration, use, and infringement of trademarks and related marks, § 43(a), 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a).
The case is relevant to the interpretation of the original § 43(a) of the Lanham Act, which may have referred only to the geographic location in which the goods originated.
The case is relevant to the interpretation of the original § 43(a) of the Lanham Act, which may have referred to origin of source or manufacture.
